attributes.action: Give Driving tests to all drivers that have been banned from driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a driver looses his/her driving licence for what ever reason. Drinking, Speeding, Dangerous driving etc. They are normally banned for a few years. In which case they are not on the road driving. hence when they get their licence back they may not be aware of changes to the law, New speed limits on roads in their area and May not be used to handling a car(driving in general).At lease new drivers are taught these things. The thought of taking another driving test, may also encourage drivers to be more careful when driving.
